name: ValidatorTest
description: Unit tests for validating various functionalities of the Validator class.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.signature: public static Date formatDate(final Object bean, final Field field)

methods.name: isCapLetter
methods.signature: public static boolean isCapLetter(final Object bean, final Field field, final List<String> l)

methods.name: setupDateResources
methods.signature: private ValidatorResources setupDateResources(final String property, final String action)

nested_classes.name: TestBean
nested_classes.description: Internal test bean class with properties for letter and date.

test_cases.name: testManualBoolean
test_cases.description: Tests the manual boolean validation method to ensure it correctly validates a single capital letter.

test_cases.name: testManualBooleanDeprecated
test_cases.description: Tests the manual boolean validation method to ensure it correctly validates a single capital letter.

test_cases.name: testManualObject
test_cases.description: Tests the manual object validation method to ensure it correctly formats and validates a date string.

test_cases.name: testOnlyReturnErrors
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of only returning errors in the validation results.

test_cases.name: testOnlyValidateField
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of only validating a specific field in the validation process.
